pr_title: Gradually make `pulsar-broker` conform the project style check

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure if this works. It might potentially fail the license header check.
timeline.author: sijie
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -6,9 +6,9 @@ * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance * with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at - * - * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 - * + *

replies.bodyText:
I am not sure if this works. It might potentially fail the license header check.

I think it works, but it seems mvn license:format is not a right command to generate license for project, do you know what's the right one?
replies.author: Renkai

replies.bodyText:
mvn license:format is the right command to format the license. Otherwise you will fail the CI. checkstyle is enabled on pulsar-client-api module. You can find there is no

in the license header. https://github.com/apache/pulsar/blob/master/pulsar-client-api/src/main/java/org/apache/pulsar/client/api/Authentication.java#L10
replies.author: sijie

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/pulsar-broker/src/main/java/org/apache/pulsar/broker/BookKeeperClientFactoryImpl.java b/pulsar-broker/src/main/java/org/apache/pulsar/broker/BookKeeperClientFactoryImpl.java index 7f54d0148ba..f082dcbdd86 100644 --- a/pulsar-broker/src/main/java/org/apache/pulsar/broker/BookKeeperClientFactoryImpl.java +++ b/pulsar-broker/src/main/java/org/apache/pulsar/broker/BookKeeperClientFactoryImpl.java @@ -6,9 +6,9 @@ * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance * with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at - *

+ * * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 - *

+ * * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, * software distributed under the License is distributed on an * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
